citations.desc: ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE.
citations.narrative:
Item Veterinary Care 2.33 a 1
At the time of inspection the facility could not produce the program of veterinary care from the consulting
veterinarian.
Facility needs to insure the program of vet care is available for review by the USDA.
Correct by 1/13/2017
An exit interview took place at the end of inspection with the acting director
